## Data Catalog

The West Coast Node ERDDAP data server hosts over 1,700 datasets.

On this catalog page, we’ve highlighted the most commonly used datasets by our users. To help you quickly find the dataset you need, use the interactive filter tool below — just answer a few short questions about the product type, sensor, region, and more.

To explore the full list of all available datasets, visit the [**ERDDAP Server**](https://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/info/index.html?page=1&itemsPerPage=1000).

::: {.filter-panel appearance="card" style="padding: 2rem; border-radius: 1rem; background-color: #f8f9fa;"}

### Find the dataset you're looking for  
Use the step-by-step filters below to narrow down to your ideal dataset.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
from IPython.display import display, HTML

df = pd.read_csv("spreadsheets/data_catalog_excel.csv")

# Clean linebreaks and ensure no missing Access HTML
df["Access"] = df["Access"].fillna("").astype(str).str.replace(r"\\n", "", regex=True).str.strip()

html_rows = ""
for _, row in df.iterrows():
    html_rows += f'''
    <tr class="data-row"
        data-product="{row['Product']}"
        data-sensor="{row['Sensor Type']}"
        data-region="{row['Region']}"
        data-timeseries="{row['Time Series Type']}"
        data-geo="{row['Geostationary']}"
        data-blended="{row['Blended']}"
        data-gapfilled="{row['Gap-Filled']}"
        data-derived="{row['Derived Product']}">
        <td><a href="#" class="toggle-details">{row['Title']}</a></td>
        <td>{row['Product']}</td>
        <td>{row['Access']}</td>
    </tr>
    <tr class="detail-row" style="display: none;">
      <td colspan="3">{row.get('Description', '')}</td>
    </tr>
    '''

display(HTML(html_rows))
```
</table>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  const steps = [
    { id: "productFilter", wrapper: "step-product" },
    { id: "sensorTypeFilter", wrapper: "step-sensor" },
    { id: "regionFilter", wrapper: "step-region" },
    { id: "timeSeriesFilter", wrapper: "step-timeseries" },
    { id: "geoFilter", wrapper: "step-geo" },
    { id: "blendFilter", wrapper: "step-blend" },
    { id: "gapFilter", wrapper: "step-gap" },
    { id: "derivedFilter", wrapper: "step-derived" }
  ];

  function filterTable() {
    const product = document.getElementById("productFilter").value;
    const sensorType = document.getElementById("sensorTypeFilter").value;
    const region = document.getElementById("regionFilter").value;
    const timeSeries = document.getElementById("timeSeriesFilter").value;
    const geo = document.getElementById("geoFilter").value;
    const blend = document.getElementById("blendFilter").value;
    const gap = document.getElementById("gapFilter").value;
    const derived = document.getElementById("derivedFilter").value;

    const rows = document.querySelectorAll("tr.data-row");
    rows.forEach(dataRow => {
      const detailRow = dataRow.nextElementSibling;

      const visible =
        (!product || product === "All" || dataRow.dataset.product === product) &&
        (!sensorType || sensorType === "All" || dataRow.dataset.sensor === sensorType) &&
        (!region || region === "All" || dataRow.dataset.region === region) &&
        (!timeSeries || timeSeries === "All" || dataRow.dataset.timeseries === timeSeries) &&
        (!geo || geo === "All" || dataRow.dataset.geo === geo) &&
        (!blend || blend === "All" || dataRow.dataset.blended === blend) &&
        (!gap || gap === "All" || dataRow.dataset.gapfilled === gap) &&
        (!derived || derived === "All" || dataRow.dataset.derived === derived);

      dataRow.style.display = visible ? "" : "none";
      if (detailRow && detailRow.classList.contains("detail-row")) {
        detailRow.style.display = "none";
      }
    });
  }

  // Set up progressive step visibility
  steps.forEach((step, index) => {
    const select = document.getElementById(step.id);
    if (!select) return;

    if (index < steps.length - 1) {
      const nextWrapper = document.getElementById(steps[index + 1].wrapper);
      select.addEventListener("change", () => {
        if (select.value !== "") {
          nextWrapper.style.display = "block";
        } else {
          for (let i = index + 1; i < steps.length; i++) {
            const wrapper = document.getElementById(steps[i].wrapper);
            if (wrapper) wrapper.style.display = "none";
          }
        }
        filterTable();
      });
    }

    select.addEventListener("change", filterTable);
  });

  // Reset button
  document.getElementById("resetFilters")?.addEventListener("click", () => {
    steps.forEach((step, index) => {
      const select = document.getElementById(step.id);
      if (select) select.value = "";
      if (index !== 0) {
        const wrapper = document.getElementById(step.wrapper);
        if (wrapper) wrapper.style.display = "none";
      }
    });
    filterTable();
  });

  // Toggle detail rows
  document.querySelectorAll(".toggle-details").forEach(link => {
    link.addEventListener("click", function (e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const row = link.closest("tr");
      const next = row?.nextElementSibling;
      if (next && next.classList.contains("detail-row")) {
        next.style.display = next.style.display === "none" ? "table-row" : "none";
      }
    });
  });

  // Enable <select class="access-dropdown"> to open links
  document.querySelectorAll(".access-dropdown").forEach(dropdown => {
    dropdown.addEventListener("change", function () {
      const selected = this.options[this.selectedIndex];
      const url = selected.getAttribute("data-url");
      if (url) {
        window.open(url, "_blank");
        this.selectedIndex = 0;
      }
    });
  });
});
</script>
